| Gen 2 | FPGA reborn: Yes, through Harp timestamp generator (for Acquisition Board) on any HDMI port
| Gen 3 | Now in 3D: Yes, integrated using dedicated Harp Clk Out port

| Gen 0 | The original: All Open Ephys GUI versions using the Acquisition Board plugin
| Gen 1 | More channels: All Open Ephys GUI versions using the Acquisition Board plugin
| Gen 2 | FPGA reborn:
Open Ephys GUI 1.0 and above with plugin Acquisition Board
Open Ephys 0.6.x with plugin OE Acquisition Board
| Gen 3 | Now in 3D: Open Ephys GUI 1.0 and above with plugin Acquisition Board

| Gen 0 | The original:
| `rhd2000.bit <https://github.com/open-ephys-plugins/rhythm-plugins/blob/main/Resources/rhd2000.bit>`__
| Distributed with the Open Ephys GUI
| Gen 1 | More channels:
| `rhd2000_usb3.bit <https://github.com/open-ephys-plugins/rhythm-plugins/blob/main/Resources/rhd2000_usb3.bit>`__
| Distributed with the Open Ephys GUI

| Gen 0 | The original: One on the main board and one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 1 | More channels: One on the main board and one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 2 | FPGA reborn: Only one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 3 | Now in 3D: Only one on the FPGA module.

| Gen 0 | The original: Original design from 2010. Some boards shipped in 2022 due to shortage
| Gen 1 | More channels: Main version produced by OEPS from 2016 until Dec 2022.
